item.title: Router in angular
item.description: Lettable operators RxJS 5.5, piping all the things So now we want a way to use those operators, how could we do that? Well, we said those operators are “lettable” that means we can use them by calling the let method on an observable: And if we want to chain multiple lettable operators we can keep dot chaining: import { Observable } from ‘rxjs/Rx’; import { filter, map, reduce } from ‘rxjs/operators’;
